I bought two sharkskins and got the lousy reward which included a
small lantern... lost money on the deal

Subject: [eqpaladin] reef sharks

> From: rmiller@...
>
> I am a level 8 paladin, and the only quest that I have attempted from the Guild instructors wanted me to kill some reef sharks and bring back the skins. I can't find the reef sharks in the Ocean of Tears anywhere. I have found one hammerhead shark and killed it but didn't get a skin. Any
idea where to find "reef sharks"??? Just a hint would be great! Thanks for your help.
>
> Grod
